text: Shane Wiedt (born July 19, 1995) is an American soccer player who plays as a defender for Loudoun United in the USL Championship. ==Career== ===College & Amateur=== Wiedt began playing college soccer at the University of Akron in 2014, which he redshirted, but completed three seasons with Akron before transferring to the University of Pittsburgh in 2018 for his final college season. During college, Wiedt appeared in the National Premier Soccer League with Erie Commodores in 2017.http://eriecommodores.bonzidev.com/sam/teams/index.php?team=3431640 Following college in 2019, Wiedt also played with NPSL side Virginia Beach City.http://virginiabeachcityfc.bonzidev.com/sam/teams/index.php?team=10089560 ===Professional=== On August 9, 2019, Wiedt signed for USL Championship side Loudoun United. He made his professional debut on September 7, starting in a 5-1 loss to Hartford Athletic. ==References== ==External links== *Akron bio *Pitt bio *USL bio * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:Akron Zips men's soccer players Category:Pittsburgh Panthers men's soccer players Category:Loudoun United FC players Category:Soccer players from Ohio Category:National Premier Soccer League players Category:USL Championship players
title: Shane Wiedt
